messages.content: You are tasked with creating a structured output from the provided user message.

Files containing the getProductById handler implementation (paths relative to the project root):

- backend/controllers/productController.js

Explanation / how I found it:
- I searched the repository for occurrences of "getProductById".
- The function implementation is defined in backend/controllers/productController.js as an async handler:
  - It uses Product.findById(req.params.id).
  - If a product is found it returns it (res.json(product)); otherwise it sets status 404 and throws an Error('Product not found').
- The routes file you provided (routes/productRoutes.js) imports getProductById from ../controllers/productController.js and uses it for GET /:id; that import corresponds to the implementation in backend/controllers/productController.js.
- I ignored test files and only inspected source files (controllers) for the handler implementation.

files.description: List of paths to the files that contain the handler implementations.
